sentence.Network_en: Why don't you let your mother pamper you for a while?
sentence.Network_cn: 何不让你母亲宠你一段时间呢？

sentence.Network_en: Pamper yourself with our new range of beauty treatments.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽情享受一下我们的新系列美容服务吧。
别把你的小女儿娇坏了!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 比如帮宝适(Pampers)产品就是说孩子们只有夜里睡得好，才能健康成长。它没有停留在说帮宝适比竞争对手的品牌更干爽的层面上。
纵字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 纵然〖 evenif;eventhough〗 纵容〖 indulge;pamper;connive;winkat〗 纵身〖 jump;leap〗.
传人用纸尿布（pampers），所以没有准备防水内裤。（讨论贴在：http://lkcn.net/eubb...showtopic=61464）
宝洁公司的帮宝适纸尿裤(Pampers)在向互联网领域拓展的过程中，通过与年轻父母的互动，使品牌的承诺和附加值得到提升。在该网 …

list.abs: 9.宠物宝贝（Pet pampering）几年前，只有便宜的连锁旅馆和最高级的酒店才能让你带宠物床。现在「友善对待宠物」的观念，已成 …
Don ' t pamper your dog ., 别宠你的狗.
pampering parents often have spoilt children ., 纵容的父母总是会有被惯坏了的孩子.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'cram with food'): probably of Low German or Dutch origin; compare with German dialect pampfen 'cram, gorge'; perhaps related to pap

entry.def: If you pamper someone, you make them feel comfortable by doing things for them or giving them expensive or luxurious things, sometimes in a way which has a bad effect on their character.

example.ex: Why don't you let your mother pamper you for a while?...
example.tran: 何不让你母亲宠你一段时间呢？

example.ex: Pamper yourself with our luxury gifts...
example.tran: 用我们的精美礼物宠爱一下自己吧。

auth_sentence.content: Pamper your passion for all the things that are lovely.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pamper your passion for all the things that are lovely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pamper your passion for all the things that are lovely.

auth_sentence.content: They didn't pamper themselves with air conditioning and they didn't feel entitled to the world on a silver platter.
auth_sentence.res_content: They didn't pamper themselves with air conditioning and they didn't feel entitled to the world on a silver platter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They didn't pamper themselves with air conditioning and they didn't feel entitled to the world on a silver platter.

auth_sentence.content: There's plenty of parlors here, and they really know how to pamper you.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's plenty of parlors here, and they really know how to pamper you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's plenty of parlors here, and they really know how to pamper you.

means.word_mean: 宠；娇养；细心照顾；精心护理；娇惯；纵容
